class.name: Path2D
class.brief_description: Contains a [Curve2D] path for [PathFollow2D] nodes to follow.
class.description: Can have [PathFollow2D] child nodes moving along the [Curve2D]. See [PathFollow2D] for more information on the usage. Note that the path is considered as relative to the moved nodes (children of [PathFollow2D]). As such, the curve should usually start with a zero vector [code](0, 0)[/code].
